weather.description: Current weather in Bath is generally mild and overcast.
weather.recommendation: Dress in layers as the temperature can fluctuate. A light jacket or sweater is recommended.  Carry an umbrella in case of showers.

route_summary.weather_advisory: Mild and overcast conditions in Bath.  Be aware of potential for reduced visibility due to mist or light rain.
route_summary.feasibility_assessment: This route is feasible and uses major motorways.

steps.instruction: Start at Hyde Park Corner, heading west on the A4 (Piccadilly).
Continue onto the A4, passing Knightsbridge and South Kensington.
Join the M4 motorway (westbound) towards Heathrow/Reading/Bristol.
steps.notes: Stay on the M4 for the majority of the journey.

steps.instruction: Exit the M4 at Junction 18 for Bath.
Follow the A46 into Bath city centre.
steps.notes: Follow signs for the city centre.

recommendations: Consider stopping at Reading Services for a break if needed.
Pre-book parking in Bath city centre as it can be busy.
safety_concerns: Drive carefully in overcast conditions, especially if there is mist or light rain. Reduce speed and increase following distance.
Be aware of other drivers on the motorway, especially during peak hours.
